description:
As a child, Tory Lund became heavily traumatized after a meteor caused a stampede of Walrein to frighten him. This fear of being close to Pokémon continued for years although he was secretly interested in them. He did, however, befriend an entity that was actually Deoxys.
Tory Lund first met Ash accidentally when they were paired in a team battle against Rafe and Sid. As Tory Lund had no Pokémon of his own, Ash lent his Torkoal, but Tory Lund`s lack of experience caused the two to lose.
name: Tool
